description:
Allows creation and management of a single member for a single binding within
the IAM policy for an existing Google Cloud Platform Organization.

~> **Note:** This resource __must not__ be used in conjunction with
   `google_organization_iam_binding` for the __same role__ or they will fight over
   what your policy should be.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Member.description: The user that the role should apply to. For more details on format and restrictions see https://cloud.google.com/billing/reference/rest/v1/Policy#Binding.

OrgId.description: The numeric ID of the organization in which you want to create a custom role.

Role.description:
The role that should be applied. Note that custom roles must be of the format
`[projects|organizations]/{parent-name}/roles/{role-name}`.
